step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
You are inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
You are exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out as you exhale.
Great job starting the second repetition comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen.
Your hands are on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
You are inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize fluid moving to your chest.
You are exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! You followed the instructions well by placing your hands on your abdomen, inhaling through your nose while tightening your body, and exhaling through your mouth while relaxing. Keep up the good work!
